search_query: Gen Digital competitors 2025 consumer cybersecurity market
context: Gen Digital operates in rapidly growing Consumer Security Market expected to reach $43.65 billion in 2025 and $69.01 billion by 2030 (9.60% CAGR). Norton/Avast/LifeLock units reported 500M users with $38M net revenue added in Q3 2025, leveraging freemium funnels and brand familiarity. Market shows moderate concentration with handful of global brands holding large subscriber pools. Strategic diversification: April 2025 acquisition of MoneyLion Inc. expanded into financial wellness/FinTech. Microsoft remains largest by installation share via Windows OS default inclusion. Competition from dedicated cybersecurity firms and cloud-native providers.
